channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Science
channel.desc: A weird and wonderful look at how gravity, magnetism and friction impact everything. With Fred Sirieix.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio as they attempt to win the regional dance championships. Michelle decides to change the line positions, but Emily and Stephanie are not happy about it. Emily confesses a secret to Eldon that brings them a little closer.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: OOglies
channel.desc: The OOglies slip, slide and splat all over the place. This fast-paced, madcap stop-motion animation uncovers the mischief everyday household objects get up to when no-one is looking. The thrill-seeking eggs take up bungee jumping, the potato racers whizz around, and Mr Strawberry serenades Mrs Strawberry. Fearless Pete Parsnip comes face to face with a terrifying hairy spider, and Slippery Nana comes a cropper impressing the judges in the talent show.
